column4: hi, for some reason when I try to connect to my wireless network via static IP, I can ping the router but nothing else. Every field is as it should be...what gives?
what exactly am I doing here?
I'm trying to connect with wireless
lets see the whole routing table
Just trying to help... I think I understand your issue, you are wired to a router that you are trying to access wirelessly
I'm wired to it because I can access it wirelessly, but not the internet wirelessly
I'm doing that because DHCP isn't working on the router
any idea what the issue is?
I understand - one issue is that your wired network 192.168.0.0/24 but you wireless network is 192.168.0.0/20
that's what's on the router page as the subnet mask
